name: RetroPGF Round 3
excerpt: Captures a comprehensive timeline of the entire procedure of RetroPGF Round 3
content: This process and timeline outline provides a clear overview of the key stages and dates involved in the project applications, voting process, results & token disbursement for RetroPGF Round 3.

events.title: Project Applications
events.summary: During this phase, interested project teams could submit their project applications. Project applications will be accepted from September 19th to October 23rd 2023. Applicants will typically have to provide detailed information about their projects.

events.title: Voting
events.summary: Following the project application period, a voting phase will take place. The voting period starts from November 6th to December 7th 2023. Voting badges have been offered to 208 community members.

events.title: Results & Token Disbursement
events.summary: After the voting phase will conclude, the results of the selected projects will be determined. Starting in early January, the process of disbursing tokens or funding to the chosen projects will begin.
